What two things can you never eat for breakfast?.....Lunch and Dinner!
What word is spelled incorrectly in every single dictionary?.....Incorrectly

What 5-letter word becomes shorter when you add two letters to it?.....Short
Why can't a bike stand on it's own?.....Because it is two-tired.

patterns: What are the departments for Engineering Faculty in KGEC

responses: The Departments for Engineering in KGEC are Computer Science and Engineering, Information Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering.

The Departments for Engineering courses in KGEC are Computer Science and Engineering, Information Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering.

The specialisations for Engineering courses in KGEC are Computer Science and Engineering, Information Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering.
